projects.title: This Website
projects.description: Using some experience in Typescript and React, I built this website to showcase my projects and experience. The website is hosted on Render.io, and the source code is available on GitHub. A previous version of the website was built using HTML and CSS.

projects.title: Robotic Arm
projects.description: For my Embedded Design class at Northeastern University, I developed a robotic arm using pulse width modulation (PWM) to control its movements. The goal was to program the arm to pick up a bottle from various positions and move it with precision.

projects.title: NU Electric Racing Club
projects.description: Contributed to the telemetry team using telemetry-XBee for real-time data transfer and InfluxDB Flux for data visualization. Helped monitor car components in a high-performance engineering environment.

projects.title: NEU SEDS, Rover Team
projects.description: Worked on rover localization systems to enable autonomous navigation. Gained hands-on experience in robotics and space exploration.

projects.title: UNET Image Classifier
projects.description: Created a pipeline for scraping and segmenting images using a U-Net model. Labeled data with the LabelBox API and trained on bird species datasets with high accuracy.
